Package com.project.CyShare.controller

Class BookingController

java.lang.Object
com.project.CyShare.controller.BookingController
@RestController public class BookingController extends Object
Controller used to perform tasks on current booking orders.
Author:
Bhuwan Joshi

  • Method Details

    • getAllBooking

      @GetMapping("/booking/all") ArrayList<BookingDetails> getAllBooking()
      This mapping returns a list of all bookings saved.
      Returns:
      List of all bookings.

    • getDetailsByName

      @GetMapping("/booking/{name}") BookingDetails getDetailsByName(@PathVariable String name)
      This mapping gets the booking details by name.
      Parameters:
      name - Booking name.
      Returns:
      BookingDetails object.

    • addBooking

      @PostMapping("/booking/add") String addBooking(@RequestBody BookingDetails book)
      This mapping is used to add a new booking into the database.
      Parameters:
      book - Booking details to add.
      Returns:
      Success/failure message.

    • addMaps

      @PutMapping("/booking/add/maps/{userName}") String addMaps(@RequestBody List<Maps> map, @PathVariable String userName)
      This mapping is used to assign a location to a given user.
      Parameters:
      map - Location to be assigned.
      userName - Username of the user that will have location updated.
      Returns:
      Success/failure message.

    • addStatus

      @PutMapping("/booking/status/{user}/{status}") String addStatus(@PathVariable String user, @PathVariable Status status)
      This mapping is used to set the status of a booking.
      Parameters:
      user - userName.
      status - new booking status.
      Returns:
      Success/failure message.
